title: Depend on NuGet PackageGroup instead of NuGet.BuildTools
body:
Internal bug: https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/844554

Once it exists, we will need to retarget the MSBuild VSIX package to depend on the new NuGet PackageGroup, instead of:

https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/0da7b4d3d9066daf43658fa09a13d1c299a02487/src/Package/MSBuild.VSSetup/files.swr#L8-L10

nodes.body: The name of the new package group is Microsoft.VisualStudio.PackageGroup.NuGet
